mapper.select: select gp_title, gp_price, gp_date_start, gp_date_last, gp_content, gp_idx, gp_thumb from gp natural join User where gp_idx=#{gp_idx}
select gp_idx, gp_uid, user_idx, gp_zipcode, gp_addr, gp_name, gp_email, gp_total, gp_num from gpUser where user_idx=#{user_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into gp (gp_title,gp_content,gp_price,gp_date_start, gp_date_last, gp_thumb, user_idx) VALUES (#{gp_title}, #{gp_content},#{gp_price},#{gp_date_start},#{gp_date_last},#{gp_thumb}, #{user_idx})
mapper.update: update gp set gp_title=#{gp_title}, gp_content=#{gp_content}, gp_price=#{gp_price}, gp_date_start=#{gp_date_start}, gp_date_last=#{gp_date_last}, gp_thumb=#{gp_thumb} where gp_idx=#{gp_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into gpUser (gp_idx, user_idx,gp_uid, gp_zipcode, gp_addr, gp_name, gp_email, gp_total, gp_num) VALUES (#{gp_idx},#{user_idx},#{gp_uid},#{gp_zipcode},#{gp_addr},#{gp_name},#{gp_email},#{gp_total}, #{gp_num})
mapper.delete: delete from gpUser where user_idx=#{user_idx} AND gp_idx=#{gp_idx}
